component.name: PGE
component.doc: Performs positional gene enrichment (PGE) as described in De Preter et al. (2008).(
component.author: Christian Frech

input.name: query
input.doc: CSV file with query gene IDs in first column. IDs must match attribute 'gene id' in provided GTF file.

input.name: reference
input.doc: GTF file with all genes of reference genome in gzipped (.gz) format (background gene set).

parameter.name: caption
parameter.default: Genome-wide overview of positional gene enrichments (PGEs). Individual genes are indicated above chromosomes and significantly enriched regions below.

parameter.name: cmdPrefix
parameter.doc: Prefix put before issued system commands (e.g. docker string)

parameter.name: sectionTitle
parameter.doc: Title of the LaTeX section or an empty string to omit the section

parameter.name: sectionType
parameter.doc: Type of LaTeX section: usually one of section, subsection or subsubsection. No section statement is written if sectionTitle is empty.

parameter.name: maxRegionsPerChr
parameter.doc: Maximum number of regions per chromosome shown in ideogram. If the number of enriched regions is larger than this number, only the most significant regions are shown.
